item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: February 26, 2025 Today's Verse John 14:2–3 [2] In my Father’s house are many rooms. If it were not so, would I have told you that I go to prepare a place for you? [3] And if I go and prepare a place for you, I will come again and will take you to myself, that where I am you may be also. This Year's Memory Verse Review Isaiah 40:28 - Have you not known?
